titles.title: How Could He Come And Die For Me?

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
How could He come and die for me?
How could He love me so?
How could He hang on a cross for me?
And bring Himself so low?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He looked down and He saw His life in me.
He looked down and He saw what I would be.
He did not die for what I am,
But He died for what I would be.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
How can I go and die for you?
How can I love you so?
How can I hand on a cross for you?
And bring myself so low?

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I look up and see His life in you.
I look up and see what you will be.
I will not die for what you are.
I'll die for what you will be.
